1.text: Paul, a servant of God, and an apostle of Jesus Christ, according to the faith of God’s elect, and the acknowledging of the truth which is after godliness;

2.text: In hope of eternal life, which God, that cannot lie, promised before the world began;

3.text: But hath in due times manifested his word through preaching, which is committed unto me according to the commandment of God our Saviour;

4.text: To Titus, [mine] own son after the common faith: Grace, mercy, [and] peace, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ our Saviour.

5.text: For this cause left I thee in Crete, that thou shouldest set in order the things that are wanting, and ordain elders in every city, as I had appointed thee:

6.text: If any be blameless, the husband of one wife, having faithful children not accused of riot or unruly.

7.text: For a bishop must be blameless, as the steward of God; not selfwilled, not soon angry, not given to wine, no striker, not given to filthy lucre;

8.text: But a lover of hospitality, a lover of good men, sober, just, holy, temperate;

9.text: Holding fast the faithful word as he hath been taught, that he may be able by sound doctrine both to exhort and to convince the gainsayers.

10.text: For there are many unruly and vain talkers and deceivers, specially they of the circumcision:

11.text: Whose mouths must be stopped, who subvert whole houses, teaching things which they ought not, for filthy lucre’s sake.

12.text: One of themselves, [even] a prophet of their own, said, The Cretians [are] alway liars, evil beasts, slow bellies.

13.text: This witness is true. Wherefore rebuke them sharply, that they may be sound in the faith;

14.text: Not giving heed to Jewish fables, and commandments of men, that turn from the truth.

15.text: Unto the pure all things [are] pure: but unto them that are defiled and unbelieving [is] nothing pure; but even their mind and conscience is defiled.

16.text: They profess that they know God; but in works they deny [him], being abominable, and disobedient, and unto every good work reprobate.
